explanation: [0-0] In the scene, a sable antelope is lowering its head to drink water by the waterhole, and a lioness is lying behind a mound on the opposite bank of the waterhole, staring at the sable antelope. The background is yellow soil.
[0-6] The lioness lowered her body, looking for an opportunity to attack. At this time, the screen switched, and the lioness suddenly rushed out and pounced on the sable antelope.
